name: Honestly...IDK
description:
Bad game for the trijam151 using Pico-8.

The game is created by me, @Yolwoocle(code and art ) and @Gouspourd(Incredible cover).

Here is the lore : You're the little present in the middle and above and under you are your pas and future. You control them all and need to survive the longer you can. Don't forget that everything has consequences especially when we're talking about Time.

The game is awful with bad content because we weren't inspired at all by the theme which was : "3 ghosts (Past, Present and Future)" so after an hour of struggling for ideas we decided to give up and create a totally awful game and here it is !! Yay ! Play it please... Please *sad face*. Oh and Use arrow Keys to move ^^

All this game is ironical of course, don't report us it's actually a not so bad game but it's neither good. Im sorry to everybody who has played this.
